name: Cargo Truck Driver Simulator
description:
Try to be the best Truck driver in the city and become a real trucker!
Cargo Truck Driving Simulator gives you a realistic truck driving experience! Feel like a real trucker and drive heavy loaded Euro truck in most beautiful and realistic 3d environment. Drive your truck fast but carefully because you can crash and lose all of your cargo on this dangerous roads. Your goal is to deliver different type of cargo services on their destination on this cargo delivery truck in limited time. This is new and unique game idea of grand truck drifting. Enjoy the thrills of truck driving simulation by offroad truck drifting. Just download this truck driving and parking game and enjoy the best cargo truck driving game of 2018.
